title: Nerf Herder - How To Meet Girls
description:
Nerf Herder 
How To Meet Girls
Punk Pop/Geek Rock
2000
192Kbps

1.Vivian 
2.Courtney 
3.Lamer Than Lame 
4.Feeling Bad 
5.Pantera Fans In Love 
6.5000 Ways In Love 
7.She&#039;s A Sleestak 
8.Jonathan 
9.For You 
10.Life On Mars 
11.Pervert 

Front, Back Inside And CD Covers Included.


Mostly known for providing the theme song to a programme about a certain vampire slayer, Nerf Herder prove with this album that they have alot more to offer. "How To Meet Girls" is brightly melodic, cracking pop-punk of the highest order. This is dumb, wacky, and just great fun.Opening track "Vivian" is a heart-warming tale of lost love and the adventure of starting a band, condensed into the most catchy 2mins 40seconds you&#039;ll ever hear. "Lamer Than Lame" and "Feeling Bad" are anthems for every love sick and lonely teenage boy out there. And the closing statement of "Pervert" is a witty and rather disturbing piece of textbook punk. The simplicity and effectiveness of this genius is quite affecting. You can&#039;t fault the Nerf&#039;s knack of turning out insanely catchy, feel-good tunes. This is such light-hearted, and insanely funny stuff, it makes Blink 182&#039;s last album sound like a collection of ultra-serious, protest songs. With such memorable lines as "The night you invited me over to watch Hollywood Squares/ You left me in your room, I left a stain on your teddy bear", Nerf Herder prove they&#039;re stupid, puerile and proud of it!

Enjoy! :)
